meanings.definition: A person who teaches in a school.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated schoolmasters guided the students with care.
meanings.sent2: The schoolmasters at our school are very knowledgeable.
meanings.sent3: The schoolmasters decided to have a dance-off to teach the students about rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The schoolmasters were the shepherds of knowledge in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The schoolmasters' passion for teaching shone brightly in the classroom.

meanings.definition: The group of teachers in a school.
meanings.sent1: Our school has a diverse group of schoolmasters.
meanings.sent2: The schoolmasters meet every week to discuss curriculum.
meanings.sent3: The schoolmasters organized a surprise party for the principal.
meanings.sent4: The schoolmasters worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The schoolmasters' dedication to education was evident in their teamwork.
